org.opensocial.explorer.specserver.temp

Class TempGadgetSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opensocial.explorer.specserver.DefaultGadgetSpec
      • org.opensocial.explorer.specserver.temp.TempGadgetSpec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GadgetSpec, JSONSerializable

    public class TempGadgetSpec
extends DefaultGadgetSpec
    A temporary GadgetSpec that exists in memory only. Temporary gadget specs are transient and won't be available across server restarts. These temporary specs are used when users make changes to gadgets client-side and want to test those changes. TODO: The abstraction is broken (or at least muddled) here because there are several methods that simply throw UnsupportedOperationExceptions.

      • getPathToSpec

        public String getPathToSpec()
        Description copied from interface: GadgetSpec
        Returns the path to the specification of the gadget. By default this is on the classpath, although overriding implementations could choose to load the spec from elsewhere.
        Specified by:
